0: An Unmarried Woman In this 1978 film, Erica—played by Jill Clayburgh—has been dumped by her husband out of the blue. At first Erica reacts by vomiting. But then, she starts living it up. She tosses her husband's golf clubs. She takes up with a series of artists (including the sensitive beardo). And in this scene, she pretends to be a ballerina and dances around her well-appointed New York apartment in her underwear.
